resources.string:
Bill: Rp. %1$s
Expense: Rp. %2$s
Your Expense: Rp. %3$s
%4$s owes %5$s Rp. %6s.

Bill: Rp. %1$s
Expense: Rp. %2$s
Your Friend's Expense: Rp. %3$s
owes your Friend are even.

"Eat & Split" makes it easy to divide expenses when dining with friends. Users can input the total bill, personal expenses, and friends\' expenses, and the app will automatically calculate and display the results. Intuitive features help users divide expenses fairly. Additionally, it can easily track transaction histories.
